Hello

My name is Silvio Paganini and I write code.
I like science, astronomy, cosmology, maths, snowboard, food and travelling.
One day I'll disappear and be a travel blogger or a snowboarder (ok, maybe not).

I'm the Co-Founder of FLUUUID, curator of codedoodl.es,
part of TheFWA Judging panel, moderator of DevCon.London.
Sometimes I write articles on Medium and blog inspirational art.

In the past 14 years, I've worked for North Kingdom, Nexus Interactive Arts,
UNIT9, Hi-ReS!, R/GA, Sapient Nitro, Blast Radius, Agency Republic, Bleed,
GyroHSR, EURO RSCG, Publicis, JWT and Rapp Digital.

Get in touch. I'm available for freelance work and art project collaboration.
Or just up for a good chat over coffee/beer/wine/__put-here-your-fav-drink__

Too shy to get in touch? Just download my boring Resum√© or stalk my Linkedin.
